OOC: LurkerAbyss, can you do something with Slaughter, he's been 
sitting on his ass for a while, and he's holding up progress. I'd say 
he's about dead...


--- Dead-End / Drag Strip / Astrotrain / Rippersnapper ---

Dead-End and Drag Strip leave the ship, arrive infront of Megatron, 
and salute. 

Astrotrain is outside and being unloaded.

Rippersnapper fires twice at Slaughter, ignoring Megatron, due to his 
intense hate for organics.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron returned the salute. "Now if we may, I have important 
buisness
> to attend to. Right now we are vulnerable out in the open here, and 
we
> have an intruder. He will wish he never came here." Megatron smiled
> wickidly. He opened a comm link to all Decepticons. "Stunticons,
> Terrorcons, report outside. Astrotrain and Cyclonus come as well." 
He
> closed the comm-link, and looked at Blindfear, Nightstrike and
> Firestrike. "You three, begin loading the ship full of energon." He
> turned to Shockwave. "I assume you would like him repaired?." 
Megatron
> said, pointing at Unitron.
